member.name: WS_STRING_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: This type description is used with and is optional. It is used to specify constraints on the set of values which can be deserialized.

member.name: WS_STRING_DESCRIPTION.minCharCount
member.summary: Specifies the minimum number of characters.

member.name: WS_STRING_DESCRIPTION.maxCharCount
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters.
